mapper.select: SELECT id, name FROM Item WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Ownership WHERE lowerId = ${id} AND ownershipType = "ITEM" AND id > 0; DELETE FROM Item WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE Item SET name=#{name} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT i.* FROM Item i, Ownership o1, Ownership o2, group_table gt WHERE (gt.id = ${id} AND gt.DTYPE = 'BigGroup' AND gt.id = o2.upper_id AND o2.ownershipType = 'Item' AND o2.lowerId = i.id) OR (gt.id = ${id} AND gt.DTYPE = 'BigGroup' AND gt.id = o1.upper_id AND o1.lowerId = o2.upper_id AND o1.ownershipType = 'GROUP' AND o1.lowerId = i.id)
